title: When You're Going Back To Bot Lane
body:
but your adc dies before you get there. 

http://i.imgur.com/YAe0B9Z.gif

replies.body:
Then they AFK

It is the circle of ~~life~~ ADC.
When you are just browsing the boards and you stumble on someone else who has seen Mikakunin de Shinkoukei.  WOOT, great show btw.

Ty for the sauce.

Not all heroes wear capes.
Then they spam ping MIA on you and flame you for not saving them.

I get this so many times as a support, it never ceases to amuse me.

"WTF WHERE WERE U SUPP?"
"... I was in base. Shopping."
"Noob support! Doesn't even help."
"Sorry, next time I'll use my insta teleport anywhere ability and help you. mb"

What is that...
its a yellow furry blob thing?
